name: Biceps Curls With SZ-bar
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a SZ-bar with an underhand grip on each side.
2. Keep your back straight and core engaged throughout the exercise.

3. Curl your upper arms forward, keeping only your forearms stationary and in contact with the bar.
4. Move your forearms forward and up until the handles of the SZ-bar meet the front of your shoulders.
5. Focus on moving at a slower pace to ensure proper form and control.

6. Hold for a brief moment at the top of the curl before slowly returning the weight back down to the starting position.
7. Keep squeezing your biceps throughout the exercise, and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Biceps curls with a SZ-bar is an isolation exercise that targets the muscles of the upper arms, specifically the biceps.
